system-monitor.name: System Health Monitor
system-monitor.description: Checks CPU and RAM usage instantly.

network-check.name: Internet Connectivity Test
network-check.description: Pings Google to check if internet is alive.
network-check.code: import os; response = os.system('ping -c 1 google.com'); print('Online' if response == 0 else 'Offline')

security-lock.name: Emergency Lockdown
security-lock.description: Creates a lock file to freeze system operations.
security-lock.code: open('LOCKDOWN.mode', 'w').write('LOCKED'); print('SYSTEM LOCKED UNDER EMERGENCY PROTOCOL')
